p:
The state of São Paulo is the most populous in Brazil, with approximately 45 million inhabitants, representing about 21.5% of the entire Brazilian population (209 million inhabitants)
20, 21 . Despite the fact that São Paulo, the capital of the state, is the most populous city in Brazil and Latin America
22 and in recent years has experienced major dengue epidemics, such as those in 2014 and 2015
23 , natural vertical transmission has never been detected in the city
15 .
